title: Chains with the largest share of the U.S. burger restaurant market as of June 2014
yAxis: Share of the burger restaurant market
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories for the x axis representing Burger Restaurant Chains, and a y axis representing Share of the burger restaurant market.
The highest category is found at McDonald's where Share of the burger restaurant market is 34.3.
The lowest category is found at Sonic_Drive-Ins where Share of the burger restaurant market is 8.2.
